short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension hides the NSFW content on bitclout

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blurs NSFW content improving the user experience browsing the internet. The extension uses advanced machine learning algorithms on backend to distinguish between nsfw and sfw images. Extension provides the feature of turning off the nsfw filter as and when required.
